category.name: Column Preferences
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: ReportGenerationDlg_ColumnPreferences
preference.preference_description: Determines which columns are displayed in the Report Generation wizard. This preference can also be set by editing column options directly from the interface. Column widths are defined using the ReportGenerationDlg_ColumnWidthPreferences preference. Valid Values: Accepts one or more strings as values. Each string must be one of the following report definition attributes: rd_id rd_name rd_type rd_class rd_state rd_source rd_query_source rd_property_source owning_group owning_user last_mod_date last_mod_user
